cause.description:
Missing Child ~ AMBER ALERT Discription of missing girl: Name~Reachelle Smith Hair: Light Brown, length to middle of back Eyes: Brown Age: 3 or so
Call: 1 (701) 852-0111 if you know anything!
Last seen: Residence @ 105 16th street NW, Minot ND Date: May 16th 2006 at 10:30pm
There is still hope to find her!!!!! AMBER ALERT: LOOK AT THE PICTURE BELOW>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>TRUE.... Snopes says>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>You never know where this email could end up and I'm not going to stop>>passing this one around if it means a little girl can be found!!!>>>>Please spread this picture far and wide.... You just never know.>>>>>>Child: Reachelle SmithChild: Reachelle Smith>>>>Age: 3>>Height: 40">>Weight: 40 lbs.>>Hair: Light brown straight middle of back>>Eyes: brown>>>>Clothing: no description>>>>Additional Information (Location, Date, Time): Last seen at residence105>>16th St NW, Minot, ND on May 16, 2006 at approximately 10:30 PM.>>>>>>>>BEFORE YOU SKIP THIS, LOOK AT THE CHILD. DO IT AGAIN. NOW SEND IT TOALL >>IN>>YOUR ADDRESS BOOK. IT TAKES 10 SECONDS. PEOPLE ARE MISSING HER AND SHE >>WANTS>>TO BE HOME. DO SOMETHING GOOD.>>>>If you have any information about this child or suspect, please call>>701-852-0111 immediately. The above AMBER Alert information isavailable >>to>>the public by calling 511 and at www.nd.gov/amber.>>>>CONFIRMATION OF ABOVE MARCH 19, 2007
From jessiesaturn01@hotmail.com
1. Please send out this message
2. help find this girl
3. spread the message
cause.mission: FIND THIS CHILD! Please send this info to everyone you know and invite them to join in on the cause. Donation's to the cause are of your own action.
cause.name: MISSING GIRL
